step.comment: Click the 'Customers' option from the navigation panel.
Login FastPass.

steps.step: settext loginPage:logon_text $web:username. settext loginPage:logon_password $web:password. Click loginPage:submit_button.

step.comment: Input 'Customer name' field with 'State Farm'.Click 'Search'.
step.extension: Customer information - Sorted by customer name page.

step.comment: Click the first site number in the 'Site number' column.
Click the 'Customers' option from the navigation panel.
Input 'Customer name' field with 'State Farm'.Click descending sort order.Click 'Search'.
step.extension: Customer information - Sorted by customer name desc page

steps.step: settext customerSearchPage:customerName_text $web:customerName1. setradio customerSearchPage:desc_radio. Click customerSearchPage:search_button.

step.comment: Click the 'Customers' option from the navigation panel.
Input 'Customer name' field with 'State Farm'.Sort by 'Site number'.Click 'Search'.
step.extension: Customer information - Sorted by site number page.

steps.step: settext customerSearchPage:customerName_text $web:customerName1. select customerSearchPage:sortBy_select $web:sortBySiteNum. Click customerSearchPage:search_button.

step.comment: Click the 'Customers' option from the navigation panel.
Input 'Customer name' field with 'State Farm'.Sort by 'Site number'.Click descending sort order.Click 'Search'.
step.extension: Customer information - Sorted by site number desc page.

steps.step: settext customerSearchPage:customerName_text $web:customerName1. select customerSearchPage:sortBy_select $web:sortBySiteNum. setradio customerSearchPage:desc_radio. Click customerSearchPage:search_button.

step.comment: Click the 'Customers' option from the navigation panel.
Input 'Customer name' field with 'State Farm'.Sort by 'Country'.Click 'Search'.
step.extension: Customer information - Sorted by country page.

steps.step: settext customerSearchPage:customerName_text $web:customerName1. select customerSearchPage:sortBy_select $web:sortByCountry. Click customerSearchPage:search_button.

step.comment: Click the 'Customers' option from the navigation panel.
Input 'Customer name' field with 'State Farm'.Sort by 'Country'.Click descending sort order.Click 'Search'.
step.extension: Customer information - Sorted by country desc page

steps.step: settext customerSearchPage:customerName_text $web:customerName1. select customerSearchPage:sortBy_select $web:sortByCountry. setradio customerSearchPage:desc_radio. Click customerSearchPage:search_button.

step.comment: Click the 'Customers' option from the navigation panel.
Input 'Postal code' field with '61710' and click 'Search'.
step.extension: Customer information - Sorted by customer name page

steps.step: settext customerSearchPage:customerName_text $web:customerName1. settext customerSearchPage:postalCode_text $web:postalCode1. Click customerSearchPage:search_button.
